title: Home Screen Icon
custom_preconds: Test Android OS 5 - Android 12 (or whatever is the latest). MLB App supports Android 5 and up
custom_expected:
Android Play Icon looks the same on all versions of the supported Android OSes.

(We've had issues with the icon being missing or stretched in the past)

title: Samsung Galaxy Keyboard Suppression
custom_preconds: This was found on Samsung Galaxy S5 running Android 6 and Samsung Galaxy S6 running Android 7 and on Android 9
custom_expected:
The app opens to preferred homepage or to onboarding

(No Keyboard opens)

title: In App Purchase User Session Length
custom_preconds: User does not have an account on MLB.com
custom_steps:
1.  User has an account in Google Play
2.  User downloads the App
3.  User Attempts to Launch Video on an MLB.tv archived game
4.  User navigates to the paywall
5.  User purchases the "7 day Free Trial" (does not create an MLB.com account)
6.  User successfully streams Game
7.  User backgrounds the app for 3 days
8.  User launches the app
9.  User attempts to watch an MLB.tv game
custom_expected: 10.  User is able to stream game

title: Entitlements Retrieval Failure
custom_steps:
For each of the following scenarios, block the retrieval of entitlements through Charles and verify that an appropriate error message is displayed and the app does not crash:
MLB.tv video playback
SVOD video playback
Google DAI
Bottom menu
Chromecast
Watch games tab (upon clicking a game)
Watch featured tab
Launching MLB.tv from Scoreboard
Audio EPG view
Drawer header view
Push notification settings view during onboarding
News article web view
